skills.name: Sticky Rice Cannon
skills.description: Light-weight cannon with short charging time. Basic attacks have 30% less Total DMG Multiplier.1st Sequence: Single shot.2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.Enemies hit by shells of the 2nd and 3rd charge sequences will suffer 40% slower Move and Attack Speed for 7.0s.

skills.name: Leaf-wrapped Rice
skills.description: Whenever any team member attacks an enemy with reduced Move Speed or Attack Speed, heal for 25.0 HP. Triggers once every 5s.
